name: Lost World (Kosam, SonTM89)
description:
Good luck! Have fun!

HOW TO PLAY:

  • Using WASD to move the main character around the map.
  • There are some special doors help player to teleport to other maps when walking in.
  • When arriving to Level map, player can go inside mystic grass to find monsters and fight with them.
  • Win the battle will help you learn a new ability.
